entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
